reviews.review: too many cheater and too many childish people (either kids or teenager) with abusive mouth.. don't see any effort from CSGO to overcome this. Opponent pop up a bit and kill me instantly while I hit 6 times and not death. I mean I love this game since original CS 1.6 to CS Source.. having good time with my friends over weekend. But nowadays can't barely enjoy. I guess the era is over, unless CSGO are doing about this.
tons of hackers, loads of fun with friends tho. Very competitive if you are into that thing
